topic.title: My ZeroHello Page Has Changed
topic.body:
For the last day I'm not seeing the typical Zero Hello Home Page at http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/

The left sidebar is the same, but the main content is showing like a blog page showing the most recent pages I've visited.  

I would like to change back to default.  Thanks in advance.
